mdRecord.dcterms:description: Arabic script, with accompanying transliteration into Roman script. According to Google translate, this phrase may mean "Let it go." Perhaps a reference to the hit song from Disney's Frozen? [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
